companies.description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D creation suite that supports the entire 3D pipeline, including modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing, and motion tracking. It is widely used by artists, studios, and developers for creating films, visual effects, art, 3D games, and more, and is supported by a global community.
